name: Maison Perrier® Chic Roséllini
description: The universe of non-alcoholic cocktails comes together with refreshing bursting bubbles, delicious fruits and natural flavours — the perfect low-calorie pleasure whenever you're in the mood. Taste Maison Perrier® Chic Roséllini.  BENEFITS: A blend of fruit juices, natural flavours and bursting bubbles, co-created with bartenders for a sophisticated alcohol-free cocktail experience.  INGREDIENTS: Carbonated water 91.3%, peach juice from concentrate 5.5%, sugar syrup, citric acid, natural flavour, caramel syrup, concentrates (purple carrot, blackcurrant), natural peach flavour.
